Title: Long live the victory of the great Mao Zedong Thought
Publisher: Tianjin Nankai District Candy and Cakes Company  (天津市南开区糖果糕点公司)
Notes: Advertisement of a confectionery company, promoting ideology and political campaigns as the bringers of abundance. The "Three Red Banners" in the center celebrate the General Line, the Great Leap Forward and the People's Communes.
